entities.description: An appendix that lists drug codes for open-ended questions.
A specific code assigned to a drug mentioned in open-ended questions.
A survey question that allows respondents to answer in their own words.
The misuse of drugs or alcohol.
A specific section of the survey, in this context focusing on drug codes.

relationships.description: Indicates that Appendix A contains specific codes for various drugs.
Relates the drug code to substance misuse situations.
Establishes that an open-ended question can be answered with specified drug codes.
Indicates that drug codes are part of a designated section in the survey.
